DOC.brief_summary: 1 . To assess whether Glucagon like peptide 2 ( GLP-2 ) affect lipoprotein production ( study A ) 2 . To assess whether GLP-2 affect release preform chylomicron ( study B )
DOC.brief_title: Regulation Intestinal Hepatic Lipoprotein Production Glucagon Like Peptide 2
DOC.detailed_description: Study A : Using constant feeding nasoduodenal tube stable isotope infusion , mathematical modelling utilised measure lipoprotein production clearance . The lipoprotein assess apoB-100 liver apoB-48 intestine . StudyB : Volunteers give liquid meal retinyl palmitate ( vitamin A ) label chylomicron make meal . 7 hour later give GLP-2 placebo . Measurements plasma TRL ( triglyceride rich lipoprotein ) triglyceride TRL retinyl palmitate carry see whether GLP-2 increase parameter .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , age 18 60 year 2 . Body mass index 20 kg/m2 30 kg/m2 3 . Hemoglobin 130g/L . 4 . Normal glucose tolerance response 75g , 2hr oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) 1 . Subject history hepatitis/hepatic disease active within previous two year . 2 . Any significant active ( past 12 month ) disease gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurological , renal ( Cr > 1.5 mg/dL ) , genitourinary , hematological system , severe uncontrolled treated untreated hypertension ( sit diastolic BP > 100 systolic > 180 ) proliferative retinopathy 3 . History diabetes OGTT indicative diabetes impair glucose tolerance . 4 . Any history ischemic heart disease clinically significant , active , cardiovascular history include history arrhythmia 's conduction delay ECG , unstable angina , decompensated heart failure . 5 . Abnormal liver thyroid function test 6 . Current addiction alcohol substance abuse determine investigator . 7 . Mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation 8 . Taking prescription nonprescription medication time study 9 . Having donate blood three month prior three month post study procedures 10 . A pregnancy test perform 1 3 day prior study female research participant . Those test positive pregnancy exclude .
